content: chain-5 corner space 5 double_crochet chain 3 5 double_crochet p1 2 chain 1 single_crochet in 3rd middle single_crochet of 5sc group chain 3 single_crochet in 3rd single_crochet of next single_crochet group p3 * repeat from * to * 4 times join to 1st chain-1 fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per side 10 double_crochet 1 chain-3 space 2 ch1 space 2 single_crochet 6 join with standing bphdc in 7th double_crochet of any corner group p1 bphdc in next 3 sts *skip next chain-1 and single_crochet 7 double_crochet in next chain-3 space p2 skip next chain-1 and single_crochet bphdc in next 5 sts in centre chain of chain-3 corner space blhdc chain 2 blhdc p3 bphdc in next 5 sts* repeat from * to * 4 times omit last 4 bphdc join to standing bphdc fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per side 10 bphdc 2 blhdc 7 double_crochet original design by helen shrimpton ♥ copyright © 2015 ♥ all rights reserved hint in this round the stitches are worked in two groups the 12 stitches of the corner group and the 7 stitches of the fan group 7 join with a standing bldc in 2nd stitch after any corner p1 bldc in next 4 sts p2 last stitch falls in last bphdc of corner group *in fan group bphdc in next 2 sts bpsc in next 3 sts bphdc next 2 sts p3 in corner group bldc in next 6 sts in chain-2 corner space double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet bldc in next 6 sts p4 * repeat from * to * 4 times omit last 5 bldc join to standing bldc with sl-st stitch count per side 3 bpsc 4bphdc 14dc 8 chain 1 and half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in next 18 sts * in chain-2 corner space half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 21 sts * repeat from * to * 4 times omit last 19 half_double_crochet join to 1st half_double_crochet with a sl-st stitch count per side 23 half_double_crochet original design by helen shrimpton ♥ copyright © 2015 ♥ all rights reserved for a 6-inch square stop at this point fasten_off and work in ends it will work perfectly as a stand-alone square or as smaller versions to use as a border around the larger squares 9 chain 1 and half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in next 5 sts single_crochet in next st *chain 3 skip next 3 sts single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 9 sts in chain-2 corner space half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 9 sts single_crochet in next stitch * repeat from * to * 4 times omit last 6 half_double_crochet single_crochet join to 1st half_double_crochet fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per side 2 single_crochet 20 half_double_crochet 1 chain-3 space 10 join with a standing double_crochet in any chain-2 corner space chain 5 double_crochet in same space p1 2 *double_crochet in next 8 sts single_crochet in next st ch1 skip next 2 sts in chain-3 space 5 double_crochet chain
